EmailTemplate.name: Fort Wayne Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop Tomorrow - Fort Wayne, IN - March 26
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pricing and Appraisal Workshop Fort Wayne, IN Thursday, March 26, 2015
This is a reminder that you are registered for the vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop in Fort Wayne, IN on Thursday, March 26. If you have any questions or concerns, simply reply to this email.
Location: Courtyard Fort Wayne Downtown at Grand Wayne Convention Center 1150 South Harrison Street Fort Wayne, IN 46802 (260) 490-3629
Agenda Overview: 8:00am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 8:30am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Fort Wayne Downtown at Grand Wayne Convention Center, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/fwadt-courtyard-fort-wayne-downtown-at-grand-wayne-convention-center/> or call the hotel directly at (260) 490-3629. We look forward to seeing you there!
